name: Soldier Warfare
description:
A elite soldier group has been send to complete tactical operations in this country of anarchy.

Action shooter game with tactical combat and realistic gameplay experence.

Features.

-Chapter based story: Play game divided into multiple chapter, each with multiple choices.

-Sandbox style levels: Explore different locations and discover the ruins after war.

-Rpg elements: Collect and gather items to help you advance in story.
